definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: Pull off a successful 4-point play with any player, in a non-simulated game.
sentences.chinese: 非模拟模式比赛，使用任意球员完成四分打。

sentences.english: "No, lady, "came the reply. "You stick it on the envelope ! "
sentences.chinese: “不，夫人，”邮务员回答说，“要贴在信封上。”

sentences.english: Direct the DSAS's microphone towards the source of sound.
sentences.chinese: 指令员的麦克风对源头的声音。

sentences.english: The Bartender's primary function involves serving alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages to guests of the Resort.
sentences.chinese: 吧员的主要职责是为客人提供含酒精和不含酒精饮料。

sentences.english: This salesman demonstrated how to cook with a pressure cooker.
sentences.chinese: 这个倾销员当众演示如何用压力锅煮东西。

sentences.english: Films and TV programmes are often made out of continuity.
sentences.chinese: 负责电视电影等剧情各部分安排的女场记员。

sentences.english: Hurricane forecasters expect this year's hurricane season to be busier than average.
sentences.chinese: 气象预报员预计今年的飓风季会比往常更加频繁。

sentences.english: The interviewer asked the interviewees their opinions on the minimum wage.
sentences.chinese: 访问员向受访人查问他们对最低工资的意见。

sentences.english: Is that what the weatherman says?
sentences.chinese: 这是那位天气预报员说的吗？

sentences.english: Furthermore, the store administrator may not know any of the changed users attributes.
sentences.chinese: 此外，存储管理员可能并不知道任何用户属性的改变。

sentences.english: In particular, terminology and style are subjective and are mostly deter mined by the client reviewer's preferences.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是术语和风格，大多由客户审校员的偏好来决定。

sentences.english: UNIT PRICES include for attendance upon the examining Inspector as and when required.
sentences.chinese: 单价包括应检测员的要求出席的费用？

sentences.english: But the characters who really intrigued me were the telegraph operators.
sentences.chinese: 不过令我大感兴趣的角色却是电报员。

sentences.english: Each delivery man has a table with a route number on it and the mail to deliver.
sentences.chinese: 每个快递员都有一张表，显示路径标号和地址。

sentences.english: The weatherman forecasts snow for tomorrow, so bring a warm jacket.
sentences.chinese: 天气预报员预报明天有雪，所以带件暖和的外套吧。

definition: special duty/assigned full time to a task
to ensure public security/to ensure safety (for workers engaged in production)/public security/security guard
to be in charge of/to take responsibility for/to be to blame/conscientious
to lead a group/leader of a group/captain (of sports squad)
